DOC.brief_summary: To determine the effectiveness of combining different concentrations of hydrogen peroxide and carbamide used during tooth bleaching.
DOC.brief_title: Combination of Dental Bleaching Techniques, Randomized Clinical Trial
DOC.detailed_description: 120 patiens over 18 years old. Design: Hydrogen peroxide (HP) Carbamide Peroxide (CP) Group 1: CP 10% + HP 40% Group 2: CP 15% + HP 40% Group 3: CP 20% + HP 40% Group 4: HP 10% + HP 40%
DOC.criteria: 18 45 years old Student, teacher or administrative personnel at UNIBE. Dental Hypersensitivity Periodontal disease Active caries lesions Allergy to latex Orthodontic treatment
